title: August Bicycles Generator Lamp Light Saddle Bracket STL File
content:
Many people have asked for August Bicycles to make this product a reality, but the Norwich, UK framebuilder is releasing it as a downloadable STL file first for Â£10. This allows you to 3D print for yourself, along with a fixings list for the mounting hardware. If there is enough demand, a physical product may follow.

Once printed, this bracket will allow any taillight with 50 mm spaced mounting holes to be secured to your saddle rails, tucked nicely out of the way under the seat, but in a nice high position for good visibility.

Check out more at August Bicycles.

The post August Bicycles Generator Lamp Light Saddle Bracket STL File appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
